column1: Explain the difference between population and sample in statistics.
Discuss the Central Limit Theorem and its significance in data analysis.
How do you calculate and interpret a p-value in a hypothesis test?
Explain the difference between Type I and Type II errors in hypothesis testing.
Describe different types of probability distributions (e.g., Normal, Binomial, Poisson).
When would you use correlation vs. causation analysis?
Explain the concept of bias and variance in machine learning models.
How do you handle missing data in your analysis?
Briefly explain the concept of Bayesian statistics.
Describe different ways to measure dispersion in a dataset (e.g., Standard Deviation, Interquartile Range).
